Movie plot ENGLISCH

After a group of youths go on an excursion to an old mine, they discover that it was the place where a serial killer named Martiens was put to death.
Back in the 19th century Martiens had to work as a so-called fireman - criminals who functioned as firemen had to detect gas within the mine 
 and remove it by ignition. If the fireman survived the explosion then he was pardoned.
If not, justice was rightly served. In all cases the condemned criminals never survived.
Having brought along an Ouija board for kicks, the kids unwittingly unleash the spirit of Martiens.
Although he isolated the gas successfully, he survived the blast.
But he wasn't pardoned, instead left to die within the mine.
Now he is looking for revenge. The youths' visit becomes a gruelling nightmare as, one by one, they fall prey to a hidden and merciless evil
 that takes possession of their bodies.
In a nerve wrecking race against time they have to put Martiens' spirit to rest - and get out of the mine alive...."
